snippet.title: Ruth's Journey - Official Teaser (2020)
snippet.description:
WISHLIST now on STEAM: https://bit.ly/2zCqD9L

After over 4 years in development hell, we are finally ready to announce "Ruth's Journey", a free demo to our upcoming game "The Long Way Home". Set in the TLWH universe, Ruth's Journey follows Ruth as she sets out to photograph the rare Golden Finch. 

Official Website: http://niftyllamagames.com/ruthsjourney/
sign up to the mailing list for a chance to join the Alpha: http://niftyllamagames.com/updates/

What is the game about? More here: https://youtu.be/8yX1Sevf5lk


Music by the amazing Koethe: https://bit.ly/3bhKCaN
Dev-Log 1 (meet the team): https://youtu.be/KirasUtSPmU
Dev-Log 2 (meet the Characters): https://youtu.be/TLlzQceF3-8


#ruthsjourney #niftyllamagames #9gag #thelongwayhome 
Like the video, let us know what you think in the comments.
Subscribe and hit the bell for future updates.
Join our Discord Server: https://discord.gg/qjCdv67
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/NiftyLlamaGames
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/niftyllamagames
Check out our Website: http://niftyllamagames.com/
But most importantly,
stay nifty! ;)
